title: Summer Internship
content:
Hey guys, so my cgpa is 6.9, and I'm in my 4th sem cse, so.. what are options for summer internships, I have done my homework to know that iisc and iit will be ruled out, can I intern in PESU itself as a research intern, is it a paid internship? P.s: I want to pursue an internship to build my resume..
Is there any minimum GPA requirement?

comments.body: CCBD and other research labs do take interns from batches that have just finished their second year. Unfortunately it isn't a paid internship, but the experience will help you a lot and you'll also get to work on cool things depending on the projects you're assigned to and also build connections with the professors, all of this will be more valuable than your pay. Yes there are CGPA requirements as far as I remember.
